Package dev.prozilla.pine.common

Interface Lifecycle

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationData, AnimationInitializer, AnimationUpdater, Application, ApplicationTimer, AppLogger, BorderImage, BorderImageRenderer, ButtonInputHandler, ButtonNode, CameraControlData, CameraControlInitializer, CameraControlInputHandler, CameraControlUpdater, CameraData, CameraInitializer, CameraResizer, Component, ComponentManager, DynamicText, DynamicTextUpdater, ECSManager, Entity, EntityManager, EntityQuery, Font, FrameBufferObject, FrameNode, FrameRenderer, FrameResizer, GridGroup, GridInitializer, GridInputHandler, Image, ImageInitializer, ImageNode, ImageRenderer, InitSystem, InitSystemBase, Input, InputSystem, InputSystemBase, LayoutNode, LayoutNodeArranger, LayoutNodeInitializer, LayoutNodeInputHandler, LayoutNodeResizer, LayoutNodeStyle, LayoutNodeStyler, Logger, ModManager, MultiTileInitializer, MultiTileRenderer, Node, NodeInitializer, NodeInputHandler, NodeRenderer, NodeRoot, NodeRootInputHandler, NodeRootRenderer, NodeRootResizer, NodeStyle, NodeStyleBase, NodeStyler, NodeUpdater, ParticleBurstEmitter, ParticleEmitter, ParticleFlowEmitter, ParticleFlowUpdater, ParticleInitializer, ParticleRenderer, ParticleUpdater, Renderer, RenderSystem, RenderSystemBase, Scene, Shader, ShaderProgram, SpriteRenderer, SpriteRenderSystem, SystemBase, SystemManager, TextInitializer, TextNode, TextRenderer, TextResizer, Texture, TileMover, TileRenderer, TooltipInitializer, TooltipInputHandler, TooltipNode, Transform, UpdateSystem, UpdateSystemBase, VertexArrayObject, VertexBufferObject, Window, World
public interface Lifecycle
Defines the lifecycle methods for various objects. Methods of the lifecycle are called in the following order:
  • Before lifetime:
    1. init()
    2. start()
  • During lifetime, once per frame:
    1. input()
    2. update()
    3. render()
  • After lifetime:
    1. destroy()

    Destroys the object at the end of the game loop.
